overview: Vu Quy Đại Náo tells the story of the close friends Trang, Hien and Hoang who are young people who are free to love and consider "dullness" but facing the pressure of marriage from the family. Decided to flee together; Running out of money, all three went to rent a wedding. Under the lens of director Le Thien Vien, the culture of the river and especially the wedding culture of Western provinces show affection and simplicity, this is a great plus point of the film.
title: The Perfect Wedding
